posts.name: Sasha Weiss
posts.cooked:
Today, we’re releasing version 7.68 to beta. If you’re interested in participating, join the beta group.

Release notes:

  • We fixed a bug where tapping on “Learn More” could interrupt the initial synchronization process after adding a new linked device, so now your desire for knowledge doesn’t stand in the way of progress.

Let us know about any issues you experience! Thank you for being a beta tester!

link_counts.title: Beta feedback for the upcoming iOS 7.67 release

posts.cooked:
New Version: 7.68.0.877-beta

62 new commits since 7.67.0.871-beta (+ 1 commit omitted):

Show commits

  • Bump version to 7.68 [1]

  • Switch to Xcode 16.4 [2]

  • Prevent clipping of the restore method titles [3]

  • Use RemoteConfig to turn on PQ ratchet. [4]

  • OWSChatConnection: Set Accept-Language at the connection level […] [5]

  • Update to LibSignal v0.76.3 [6]

  • Add backup version to registration message [7]

  • Fix unused result warning [8]

  • Fix false positive warning about nothing awaited [9]

  • Treat warnings as errors in SignalServiceKit [10]

  • Fix unit tests on Xcode 26 [11]

  • Update bottom bar UI when user blocks a group [12]

  • Mitigate flakiness in stories tests [13]

  • Recompute existing mediaNames, rotate link'n'sync capability name [14]

  • Drop support for legacy backup attachment locator fields [15]

  • Fix inverted offloading timestamp check [16]

  • Restrict Backup Settings exclusively to primary devices [17]

  • Remove the concept of BackupFrequency, assume daily [18]

  • Render thumbnails instead of blurhashes if we have them for pointers [19]

  • Refetch attachments before updating them as uploaded to media tier [20]

  • Remove unused Preview method [21]

  • Handle duplicate plaintext hashes with non-matching encryption keys in backup import [22]

  • Set wasNotCreatedLocally for backup-restored TSOutgoingMessages [23]

  • Use more efficient index when counting messages [24]

  • Adjust enable backups snooze time [25]

  • Check non-space-related DownloadQueueStatus for each download job [26]

  • Add BackupSettingsAttachmentDownloadTracker [27]

  • Add UX support for downloading attachments to BackupSettings [28]

  • Vary message in CLV progress view "Skip Download" sheet by BackupPlan [29]

  • Add "Optimize Local Storage" toggle to Backup Settings [30]

  • Access internal settings from registration on internal builds [31]

  • Add more backups internal settings toggles [32]

  • Remove unnecessary call to removeObserver [33]

  • Remove extra space [34]

  • Asyncify GifPickerViewController [35]

  • Remove trailing period when searching for GIFs [36]

  • Remove dead code when searching for GIFs [37]

  • Show trending GIFs when clearing the search [38]

  • Wait until call ends to build UI adapter [39]

  • Add internal settings button to check for orphan attachment files [40]

  • Users hit a black screen opening camera for in-app photos [41]

  • Don't periodically list media while free tier [42]

  • Present in-app SFSafariViewController for link'n'sync learn more [43]

  • Update units for device transfer [44]

  • Asyncify Payments.getCurrentBalance() [45]

  • Show spinner during progressive GIF search delay [46]

  • Show loading spinner while loading trending GIFs [47]

  • Show errors when loading trending GIFs [48]

  • Asyncify prepareOutgoingPayment [49]

  • Asyncify fetchPublicAddress [50]

  • Asyncify getMobileCoinAPI [51]

  • Asyncify defragmentIfNecessary [52]

  • Asyncify contact support [53]

  • Asyncify emoji indexing [54]

  • Disable view once when a draft quoted reply exists [55]

  • Fix permission prompts when starting/joining call [56]

  • Fix orientation handling for QR code scanners [57]

  • Don't reuse thumbnail attachment uploads as fullsize uploads and vice versa [58]

  • Remove OWSTableViewController [59]

  • Temporary iOS 26 tab bar fix [60]

  • Update release notes [61]

  • Update translations [62]

Gathered from signalapp/Signal-iOS 7.67.0.871-beta…7.68.0.877-beta

posts.name: Whatnoww
posts.cooked: History transfer from my Android device worked now, thanks!

New Version: 7.68.0.881-beta

1 new commit since 7.68.0.877-beta:

  • Update translations [1]

Beta testing for this release has concluded. If you find any further bugs related to this release or earlier releases, please report them on GitHub (read How to Report Bugs for more information on how to do that).

If you have feedback specifically related to the new beta version, please post it in the following topic: Beta feedback for the upcoming iOS 7.69 release.
